message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.LG, cs.MM

Reasoning: The paper focuses on the convergence analysis of adaptive distributed beamforming schemes, which involves topics related to information theory (cs.IT), networked systems (cs.NI), control systems (cs.SY), machine learning (cs.LG), and multimedia (cs.MM). The use of random search algorithms and probability measures also suggests a connection to optimization (cs.OH) and statistics (cs.ST). However, based on the content of the abstract, cs.IT and cs.NI seem to be the most relevant categories, followed by cs.SY, cs.LG, and cs.MM.
